sentences.en: An undertaker had already taken the body to be embalmed.
sentences.cn: 一位殡仪员已把尸体运去进行防腐处理。

sentences.en: An undertaker undertook to undertake an undertaking.
sentences.cn: 承办人承诺担任这一工作.

sentences.en: And in the latter situation, the incomes shall be divided equally between FCI and undertaker association.
sentences.cn: 在后者情况下, 所的收益应在主办协会和FCI之间平分.
接着又走过尼科尔斯殡仪馆.

sentences.en: As an undertaker of the exhibition tour, Shanghang Hakka Genealogy Museum is busy preparing the exhibits.
sentences.cn: 作为巡展的承办者, 上杭客家族谱馆正加紧准备展品.

sentences.en: I overtake the undertaker who takes my stake by mistake.
sentences.cn: 我追上那个误拿我赌注的承办人.

sentences.en: Oliver had been sojourning at the undertaker's some three weeks or a month.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗在殡葬承办人那里住了有个把月.

sentences.en: Politeness looks well in every man, except an undertaker.
sentences.cn: 殷勤有礼,会使任何人的外表好看, 惟有包办殡仪者除外.

sentences.en: The corpse was laid out by the undertaker.
sentences.cn: 承办殡葬者准备埋葬尸体.

sentences.en: The Don, still sitting at Hagen's desk, inclined his body toward undertaker.
sentences.cn: 堂, 仍坐在哈根的桌子那儿, 把他的身体倾向殡葬者.

sentences.en: The old - fashioned undertaker's sells burning incense and paper horses.
sentences.cn: 那个杠房出售香火和纸马.

sentences.en: The undertaker closed his eyes a moment and then began to speak.
sentences.cn: 殡葬者闭了一会儿他的眼睛,然后开始说.

sentences.en: The word "undertaker" had long been in common usage.
These are the new difficult problem that are placed before undertaker.
sentences.cn: 这些都是摆在承办人面前的新难题.

sentences.en: This way people lining - u on side of the undertaker makes the entire pharmacopoeia look silly.
sentences.cn: 有些人好像不愿意活下去,喜欢照顾殡仪馆的生意,简直让整个医药界都无能为力.

sentences.en: This way people liningside of the undertaker makes the entire pharmacopoeia look silly.
sentences.cn: 人们这种光顾殡仪馆的做法使全部药物无能为力,一筹莫展.

words.tran_cn: 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图

trans.tran_cn: 殡仪业人员，承办人，承担者
trans.tran_en: An undertaker is a person whose job is to deal with the bodies of people who have died and to arrange funerals
